title: Tailored to Your Highest Standards! Spring Valley Apartments
posting_body: ['To schedule a tour', 'We now book our tour appointments online!', 'Please call or text us at', 'show contact info', 'to self-schedule from your phone!', 'Book your appointment online today or anytime 24/7!', 'Property Description', 'You feel it even before you see it.', 'A sense of wonder: leafy trees and vast blue skies catch your eye, as if for the first time.', 'A spirit of refreshment: genuine kindness from our helpful staff, and an atmosphere of calm throughout.', 'You glance around, in awe of so much… space.', 'Private entryways wind toward buildings which tower more like townhomes than the crammed apartments you’re used to.', 'Interiors gleam with that “freshly done” feel: refinished kitchen cabinets; gray appliances; wood-look flooring, just the way you like.', 'Tranquil as it is, it’s almost shocking that the freeways sit so close: M-5, I-275, I-696 and I-96 all within one mile for when your 9-5 beckons toward Troy, Detroit or Novi.', 'As the weekend draws near, you can’t wait to stroll through downtown Farmington for live music and local fare.', 'Welcome to Spring Valley Apartments: a breath of fresh air, and a place you’re proud to call home.', 'Details', 'Availability date:', 'September 9, 2022', 'Pets:', 'Cats, Small Dogs (< 25lb), Large Dogs (> 25lb)', 'Pet notes:', 'DEPOSIT & FEES:$250 non-refundable fee--PET RENT:$30/month for 1 pet$40/month for 2 pets(per pet, 2 max allowed)', 'Deposit:', '$500 - $800 subject to approval', 'Leasing options:', '12 months', 'Leasing notes:', 'Application fee:', '$50 per person 18 years or older', 'Amenities', 'Included in Utilities Cost:', 'Utilities Cost:', 'Laundry:', 'In Unit', 'Parking type:', 'Covered', 'Parking notes:', 'Appliances:', 'Dishwasher, Refrigerator, Garbage disposal, Range/Oven, Full size washer and dryer', 'Exterior:', 'Sunrooms in select apartments, Balcony/patio in select apartments', 'Heating/cooling:', 'Heat: forced air, Air conditioning', 'Wiring:', 'Cable-ready, High-speed internet', 'Facilities and Recreation:', 'Fitness center, Tennis court, Outdoor pool', 'Security and Access:', 'Views:', 'Private views', 'Additional features:', 'Fireplace on all second floors, Extended faux-wood flooring in select apartments, Renovated kitchens in select apartments', 'Offered by:', 'Spring Valley', 'Equal Housing Opportunity']
